sector_narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war

Justice, law and order policy, planning and administration
description_narrative: Funding under this investment supports a range of activities to provide practical support to reconciliation efforts in Sri Lanka. The Australian Government will work with a range of Government of Sri Lanka counterparts to support national unity efforts. Australia will provide support to the Office of National Unity and Reconciliation to improve their strategic planning; the Ministry of Women and Child Affairs to assess the needs and gaps in services for female headed households; and the Ministry of Resettlement to develop a national resettlement policy. Australia will also support capacity building for the Northern Provincial Council; livelihood opportunities in the north; demining assistance and technical support for the establishment of the Office of Reparations. The total value of this investment is $4.1 million over 5 years, starting 2014-15.
